title: Navigate forwards to a slider in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Temperature' slider.
assertions: roleSlider nameTemperature textualValue250DegreesCelsius numericValue250IsNotConveyed orientationVertical minimumValue100IsNotConveyed maximumValue380IsNotConveyed

title: Navigate backwards to a slider in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Temperature' slider.
assertions: roleSlider nameTemperature textualValue250DegreesCelsius numericValue250IsNotConveyed orientationVertical minimumValue100IsNotConveyed maximumValue380IsNotConveyed

title: Request information about a slider in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Temperature' slider, read information about the slider.
assertions: roleSlider nameTemperature textualValue250DegreesCelsius numericValue250IsNotConveyed orientationVertical minimumValue100IsNotConveyed maximumValue380IsNotConveyed

title: Increment a slider by one step in interaction mode
instructions: With focus on the 'Temperature' slider, set its value to 25.1 degrees Celsius.

title: Decrement a slider by one step in interaction mode
instructions: With focus on the 'Temperature' slider, set its value to 24.9 degrees Celsius.

title: Increment a slider by twenty steps in interaction mode
instructions: With focus on the 'Temperature' slider, set its value to 27.0 degrees Celsius.

title: Decrement a slider by twenty steps in interaction mode
instructions: With focus on the 'Temperature' slider, set its value to 23.0 degrees Celsius.

title: Decrement a slider to the minimum value in interaction mode
instructions: With focus on the 'Temperature' slider, set its value to 10.0 degrees Celsius.

title: Increment a slider to the maximum value in interaction mode
instructions: With focus on the 'Temperature' slider, set its value to 38.0 degrees Celsius.
